mapper.sql: GRADE_ID, GRADE_NAME, GRADE_DESC, INTEGRATE_FROM, INTEGRATE_TO, STANDARD_INTEGRATE, MCMAHON_SCORE, GRADE_INDEX, IS_ENABLE
mapper.select: SELECT GRADE_ID, GRADE_NAME, GRADE_DESC, INTEGRATE_FROM, INTEGRATE_TO, STANDARD_INTEGRATE, MCMAHON_SCORE, GRADE_INDEX, IS_ENABLE FROM t_grade
SELECT STANDARD_INTEGRATE FROM t_grade WHERE GRADE_ID=#{gradeName}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_grade
GRADE_ID,
GRADE_NAME,
GRADE_DESC,
INTEGRATE_FROM,
INTEGRATE_TO,
STANDARD_INTEGRATE,
MCMAHON_SCORE,
GRADE_INDEX,
IS_ENABLE,
#{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gradeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{integrateFrom,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{integrateTo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{standardIntegrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{mcmahonScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gradeIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_grade
GRADE_NAME = #{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE_DESC = #{gradeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRATE_FROM = #{integrateFrom,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTEGRATE_TO = #{integrateTo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STANDARD_INTEGRATE = #{standardIntegrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MCMAHON_SCORE = #{mcmahonScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GRADE_INDEX = #{gradeIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where GRADE_ID = #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_grade set GRADE_NAME = #{gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE_DESC = #{gradeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTEGRATE_FROM = #{integrateFrom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTEGRATE_TO = #{integrateTo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STANDARD_INTEGRATE = #{standardIntegrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MCMAHON_SCORE = #{mcmahonScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GRADE_INDEX = #{gradeIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_ENABLE = #{isEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GRADE_ID = #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
